name: SweetWater Health
tag_list: mobile-health, mobile-technology, healthit, mhealth, stress-management, preventive-health, qualcomm, health-apps, apps, iphone-apps, digital-health
overview:
SweetWater Health™ is revolutionizing mobile health monitoring and stress management by combining proven medical research techniques with the latest mobile computing technological advances.

SweetWater Health’s web-based community provides valuable tools, social forums and wellness partners for members to measure, review and share their health and emotional states.

The SweetWater Health mHealth solution leverages a secure and proprietary SweetBeat Vital Signs database as a key element of the value proposition. The copyrighted SweetBeat™ mobile application is the core-enabling component of the tool suite. It allows access to the Sweetwater Health community and user data from any Internet-enabled platform.

SweetBeat measures Heart Rate Variability (HRV) and facilitates continuous monitoring of stress levels via a patented* learning algorithm. It provides generative feedback for users to assess and modify behaviors and reduce their stress levels.

The newest function of SweetBeat is a weight loss feature that utilizes food sensitivity testing through a camera sensor.
